name: yahoo_finance_scrape_history
description: Scrape historical price data from Yahoo Finance for a given stock. Returns date, open, high, low, close, adjusted close, and volume for past trading days.

steps.label: Wait for history table to load

steps.code: const history = []; const rows = document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(rows.length, 30); i++) { const row = rows[i]; const cells = row.querySelectorAll('td'); if (cells.length >= 6) { history.push({ date: cells[0] ? cells[0].textContent.trim() : '', open: cells[1] ? cells[1].textContent.trim() : '', high: cells[2] ? cells[2].textContent.trim() : '', low: cells[3] ? cells[3].textContent.trim() : '', close: cells[4] ? cells[4].textContent.trim() : '', adj_close: cells[5] ? cells[5].textContent.trim() : '', volume: cells[6] ? cells[6].textContent.trim() : '' }); } } const nameEl = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="quote-header"] h1'); return { symbol: '{{symbol}}', name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', data_points: history.length, history: history, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: history_data
steps.label: Extract historical price data
